markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magpie Snatch](/Feats.aspx?ID=5683) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You move quickly, snatching a shiny item that catches your eye. Stride twice, and you can Interact to pick up an unattended object at any point during your movement.
name: Magpie Snatch
